content:
Is there an easy way to check which build failed? https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/actions/runs/525390938 shows that each build was cancelled unless I'm misinterpreting the messages here.

Rust log analyzer for the PR is also empty: #81593
Normally there is a build with a :cross_mark: in the list. I think all PRs show as cancelled, because the PR was closed before any build could finish.
